    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AudioFilePlayer
    class responsible for playing music must be one instance
    BackButton
    button jumping to previous song on playlist
    BottomPanel
    panel containing progress and currently played song info
    ColorsScheme
    Contains all used colors as named variables
    ForwardButton
    button jumping to next song on playlist
    GUI
    main GUI class
    ImagePanel
    panel displaying image
    LeftPanel
    panel containing playlists buttons, located on the left of screen
    Main
    main class, starting application
    MainPanel
    panel containing MusicButtons in scrollPane
    MetadataReader
    Class responsible for reading metadata of mp3 file
    MusicButton
    button responsible for choosing song to play, displays all info about song
    MusicControls
    component containing progress, and control buttons
    MusicInfo
    component containing image and other info about currently playing song
    MusicProgress
    slider used to indicate and change progress of currently playing song important to create only one instance
    Playlist
    Playlist class contains all songs and index of currently playing one
    PlaylistButton
    button of playlist, click triggers playlist change
    PlayStopButton
    button responsible for stopping and resuming currently played song
    ReadDir
     
    SavedSources
    Contains all saved sources
    StringOperations
    class containing useful methods related to string
